title: WTB / WTTF: T205 / T206 RARE backs

posts.post_title: WTB / WTTF: T205 / T206 RARE backs
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I'm looking for nice (vg-ex or better) copies of T205 Drum/Hindu/Blank
and Ex or better T206 Uzit, Drum, BL 460, (any - Ty Cobb) ... or Ex/mt or better copies of CB, BL 350, Hindu, Lenox

I've got some pretty solid tradebait including
Plank
Magie
BL 460
etc....

Feel free to shoot me a line if you'd like to trade/sell....sending me an email to tease me about your great cards is cool too :)


Regards,
Scott
(scottglevy@yahoo.com)
